Rename variables

Source: R/rename_variables.R
rename_variables.Rd

Supports translation of item names for SF, LF and BSID.

Usage

rename_variables(
  from,
  trans = c("extend", "original", "sequence", "connect"),
  lowercase = TRUE,
  underscore = TRUE,
  trim = TRUE
)

Arguments

from

A character vector with column names

trans

One of "original", "sequence", "connect" or "extend". Desired transformation of `from`. "original" and "sequence" preserve the original item names or sequence. "connect" and "extend" translate items names to the 9-position GSED lexicon. "connect" uses existing item names (useful for joint analysis with existing data), whereas "extend" defines new 9-position names for the item names in `from`.

lowercase

Sets all variables in lower case.

underscore

Replaces space (" ") and dash ("-") by underscore ("_")

trim

Removes the "Ma_" string

Value

A character vector of the same length as `from` with processed names.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
from <- c("file", "GSED_ID", "Ma_SF_Parent ID", "Ma_SF_C01", "Ma_SF_C02")
rename_variables(from)
rename_variables(from, "sequence", lowercase = FALSE)
}
